name: Lumino (Auroranekai)
description:
There is no light without darkness, There is no shadow without light. Traverse the darkness as a sun serpent in the deep.

A small atmospheric horror experience called 'Lumino' created at the Global Game Jam 2022!

Playable on Windows with keyboard and controller.

This GGJ project was created by the Lillybuds, 
a team consisting of Frank, Thomas, Anton and Dani.

Monster sound credit goes to Vartioh.
